title: Advanced Nursing Practice Education: Instructional Design Based on Motivational Models

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: An online intensive training course for working nurse practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners maintain engagement of 85% or higher during clinical case analysis by applying the ARCS model.
Learners independently resolve complex nursing scenarios within 72 hours using self-directed learning strategies.
Learners propose three or more differentiated nursing intervention plans applying critical thinking.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
